alert.note: Alert for Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 11:03PM CDT until May 09 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL VERNON AND NORTHWESTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 1102 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over La Farge, or 12 miles east of Viroqua, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Vernon and northwestern Richland Counties, including the following locations... Rockton, Readstown, Jersey Valley County Park, Kickapoo Center, Liberty, Folsom and Avalanche. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
